name: USpinBox
doc: A numerical entry box that allows for direct entry of the number or allows the user to click and slide the number.

bEnableSlider: Whether this spin box should have slider feature enabled
SliderExponent: The exponent by which to increase the delta as the mouse moves. 1 is constant (never increases the delta).
Justification: The justification the value text should appear as.
MinDesiredWidth: The minimum width of the spin box
KeyboardType: If we're on a platform that requires a virtual keyboard, what kind of keyboard should this widget use?
ClearKeyboardFocusOnCommit: Whether to remove the keyboard focus from the spin box when the value is committed
SelectAllTextOnCommit: Whether to select the text in the spin box when the value is committed
OnValueChanged: Called when the value is changed interactively by the user
OnValueCommitted: Called when the value is committed. Occurs when the user presses Enter or the text box loses focus.
OnBeginSliderMovement: Called right before the slider begins to move
OnEndSliderMovement: Called right after the slider handle is released by the user
bAlwaysUsesDeltaSnap: Whether this spin box should use the delta snapping logic for typed values - default false
bOverride_MinValue: Whether the optional MinValue attribute of the widget is set
bOverride_MaxValue: Whether the optional MaxValue attribute of the widget is set
bOverride_MinSliderValue: Whether the optional MinSliderValue attribute of the widget is set
bOverride_MaxSliderValue: Whether the optional MaxSliderValue attribute of the widget is set

methods.name: ClearMaxSliderValue
methods.doc: Clear the maximum value that can be specified using the slider.

methods.name: ClearMaxValue
methods.doc: Clear the maximum value that can be manually set in the spin box.

methods.name: ClearMinSliderValue
methods.doc: Clear the minimum value that can be specified using the slider.

methods.name: ClearMinValue
methods.doc: Clear the minimum value that can be manually set in the spin box.

methods.name: GetAlwaysUsesDeltaSnap
methods.doc: Get whether the spin box uses delta snap on type.

methods.name: GetDelta
methods.doc: Get the current delta for the spin box.

methods.name: GetMaxFractionalDigits
methods.doc: Get the current Max Fractional Digits for the spin box.

methods.name: GetMaxSliderValue
methods.doc: Get the current maximum value that can be specified using the slider.

methods.name: GetMaxValue
methods.doc: Get the current maximum value that can be manually set in the spin box.

methods.name: GetMinFractionalDigits
methods.doc: Get the current Min Fractional Digits for the spin box.

methods.name: GetMinSliderValue
methods.doc: Get the current minimum value that can be specified using the slider.

methods.name: GetMinValue
methods.doc: Get the current minimum value that can be manually set in the spin box.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.doc: Get the current value of the spin box.

methods.name: SetAlwaysUsesDeltaSnap
methods.doc: Set whether the spin box uses delta snap on type.

methods.name: SetDelta
methods.doc: Set the delta for the spin box.

methods.name: SetMaxFractionalDigits
methods.doc: Set the Max Fractional Digits for the spin box.

methods.name: SetMaxSliderValue
methods.doc: Set the maximum value that can be specified using the slider.

methods.name: SetMaxValue
methods.doc: Set the maximum value that can be manually set in the spin box.

methods.name: SetMinFractionalDigits
methods.doc: Set the Min Fractional Digits for the spin box.

methods.name: SetMinSliderValue
methods.doc: Set the minimum value that can be specified using the slider.

methods.name: SetMinValue
methods.doc: Set the minimum value that can be manually set in the spin box.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.doc: Set the value of the spin box.
